Number of partner departments contributing at least one patient record:

:   `{r} format(nrow(data$metadata$departments), big.mark =" ")`

Number of patient records:

:   `{r} format(nrow(data$patients), big.mark =" ")`

Number of patient admissions:

:   `{r} format(nrow(data$enrollments), big.mark =" ")`

Sum of patient days:

:   `{r} format(sum(data$surveillanceEndData$patient_days_value), big.mark =" ")`

Average surveillance period per patient:

:   `{r} format(sum(data$surveillanceEndData$patient_days_value) / nrow(data$patients), digits = 2, nsmall = 1, scientific = FALSE)` days
